attributes.action: Sign this if you think Britain should leave the EU
attributes.additional_details:
We the British people are fed up with the restrictions that are imposed on us by the EU. We are no longer  self governing because of it and require real change.

Immigration, crime, finances, welfare and many other things are controlled by Brussels and we have had enough.

Please sign this petition if you believe a simple in / out vote should be cast to determine our relationship with the EU. Remember if enough votes are cast they have to listen.
